featured.text: “Well, I’m afraid you’ll find the people of Athens much the same,” replied Aesop.
Aesop replied, “Tell me where you come from and what sort of people live there, and I’ll tell you what sort of people you’ll find in Athens.”
When asked what he most wanted to do following the accomplishment, Chang replied, “Eat at McDonald’s.”
The man replied that he was very ___(33)__ about it, but people often complained that other people’s legs were always in the ___(34)__.

definition.zh_def: 回覆或回答某人的話或請求。
definition.en_def: To respond to someone or something, typically in communication.
definition.example: I will reply to your email as soon as I can.
